text.div:
DefinitionStatus

Codes identifying the stage lifecycle stage of a definition

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/definition-status defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
draft DraftThe definition is in the design stage and is not yet considered to be "ready for use"
active ActiveThe definition is considered ready for use
withdrawn WithdrawnThe definition should no longer be used
unknown UnknownThe authoring system does not know which of the status values currently applies for this definition.

name: DefinitionStatus
description: Codes identifying the stage lifecycle stage of a definition

concept.definition: The definition is in the design stage and is not yet considered to be "ready for use"
The definition is considered ready for use
The definition should no longer be used
The authoring system does not know which of the status values currently applies for this definition.
